abstract: Martha Plimpton letter comments on Oct 23 Frank Bruni Op-Ed column about public shows of solidarity by celebrities at Occupy Wall Street.
snippet: The actress Martha Plimpton, the civil rights lawyer Norman Siegel and a politics professor respond to articles about Occupy Wall Street.
lead_paragraph: The actress Martha Plimpton, the civil rights lawyer Norman Siegel and a politics professor respond to articles about Occupy Wall Street.

headline.main: Occupiers, Tea Partiers and a Dash of Star Power
headline.print_headline: Occupiers, Tea Partiers and a Dash of Star Power
headline.seo: Occupy Wall Street, the Tea Party and a Dash of Star Power
